This invoice amount does not include VAT: This invoice amount does not include VAT according to §19 paragraph 1 of the German VAT Act (UStG).
The booking fees must be transferred no: The booking fees must be transferred no later than 5 days before the work. The remaining amount must be paid directly to the helpers at the end of the work.
The customer is obliged to inform the se: The customer is obliged to inform the service provider of the specific nature of the goods to be transported and their susceptibility to damage.
Unless Arnold-Umzug is explicitly commis: Unless Arnold-Umzug is explicitly commissioned for a professional packing service, particularly sensitive objects such as marble, glass, porcelain, frames, lighting fixtures, and other objects of high fragility must be adequately protected and secured by the customer for transport.
Original or equivalent packaging is reco: Original or equivalent packaging is recommended. Unless otherwise agreed, the customer is responsible for protecting sensitive floors, walls, and elevators at both the pickup and delivery locations with appropriate means.
The booking costs (reservation fees) mus: The booking costs (reservation fees) must be transferred at least 5 days before the scheduled work to confirm the appointment in the calendar.
The remaining balance of the total servi: The remaining balance of the total service amount is to be paid directly to the helpers upon completion of the work.
Provision of a moving service including: Provision of a moving service including :workers assistants and a transporter vehicle for a total duration of up to :duration working hours. The total cost of the service is :price €, which includes the initial booking fees required to secure the date.

terms_and_conditions: The customer is obligated to inform the mover of the specific nature of the goods being transported and their susceptibility to damage. Unless Arnold-Umzug has been contracted for packing services, particularly vulnerable items—such as marble, glass, porcelain, frames, lamps, lampshades, and similarly highly sensitive objects—must be sufficiently secured for transport. Original or equivalent packaging is recommended for this purpose. Unless otherwise agreed, the customer is responsible for protecting sensitive floors, walls, and railings within the apartment, stairwell, and elevator using appropriate protective materials.
booking.payment_notice: You only pay the reservation fee online. The remaining balance must be paid directly to the workers once the service has been completed.
booking.consent.label: By submitting this booking request, I confirm that the information provided may be stored and processed for the purpose of delivering the requested service. I acknowledge that an invoice will be issued and that payment is due in accordance with the agreed conditions. I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions as well as the Privacy Policy.
